      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40dae2ac-7dac-42a1-2a8c-36c28fb4a070#1#1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Vázlat a gótikus művészethez</string>
            <string language="en">Outline for the Gothic art</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Umreiß für die gotische kunst</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Contour pour l'art gothique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esboço para a arte gothic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Profilo per arte gotica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Περίγραμμα για τη γοτθική τέχνη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Contorno para el arte gótico</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Magyar Anjou Legendárium, Legenda Aurea: Szent György legendája. A Legenda Aurea Szent György legendája felolvasása során a megfelelő képek elővillannak</string>
            <string language="en">Hungarian Anjou Legendry, Legenda Aurea: Legend of St. György. Reading out of the Legenda Aurea: Legend of St. György the matching pictures break through</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">festmény,  </string>
            <string language="en">painting</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ungarisches Anjou Legendry, Legenda Aurea: 
Legende von Str. György. Ablesen aus dem Legenda Aurea 
heraus: Legende von Str. György der zusammenpassende 
Abbildungen Bruch durch</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'Anjou Hongrois Legendry, Legenda Aurea : 
Légende de rue György. Lecture hors du Legenda Aurea : 
Légende de rue György la rupture assortie d'images à travers</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Anjou Hungarian Legendry, Legenda Aurea: 
Legenda de St. György. Leitura fora do Legenda Aurea: 
Legenda de St. György a ruptura combinando dos retratos 
completamente</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'Anjou Ungherese Legendry, Legenda Aurea: 
Leggenda della st György. Leggendo dal Legenda Aurea: 
Leggenda della st György la rottura di corrispondenza delle 
immagini attraverso</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ουγγρικό Anjou Legendry, Legenda Aurea: 
Μύθος του ST Gyφrgy. Να διαβάσει έξω του 
Legenda Aurea: Μύθος του ST Gyφrgy το 
ταιριάζοντας με σπάσιμο εικόνων κατευθείαν</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Anjou Húngara Legendry, Legenda Aurea: 
Leyenda de St. György. Lectura fuera del Legenda Aurea: 
Leyenda de St. György la rotura de los cuadros que corresponde 
con a través</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anstrich</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">peinture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pintura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">pittura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ζωγραφική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">pintura</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
